name: REDality
description:
REDality is about scape from BLUE reality to the RED one. 

Fire your weapon to detect new peaces of the real world.

Jump over HIDDEN red pieces to reload your weapon.

Controls:

  • Type 1: 
    • Movement: ARROWS
    • Jump: SPACE
    • Fire: LEFT CONTROL
  • Type 2:
    • Movement: ASWD
    • Jump: Mouse left button
    • Fire: Mouse right button
